map.item:
In this experiment, a series of numbers will be presented to you, one at a time. Some of the numbers will be spoken aloud, and others will be presented visually, as digits on the screen. Your task will be to determine whether the number that is presented is a target (whether you see it or hear it), and respond if it is.
For this part of the experiment, the target number is [TARGET_NUMBER]. Anytime you hear or see the number [TARGET_NUMBER], click the left mouse button. If any other number is presented, you do not need to respond.
Try to answer as quickly as possible while still being accurate. Remember, you need only respond by clicking the left mouse button whenever you see or hear the number [TARGET_NUMBER].
Click the left mouse button when you are ready to begin.
